title.en: A Brief Prayer to the Successive Incarnations of Dzogchenpa Changchub Dorje1

text.en: Namo śrī-gurave!
text.en-trans: namo shri gurawé

text.en: The essence of the sugatas, the all-creating sovereign,
text.en-trans: deshek nyingpo kün jé gyalpo yi

text.en: Pervades the whole of existence and peace, and therefore
text.en-trans: sizhi yong la khyab chir rik druk dro

text.en: Beings of the six classes are not other than Samantabhadra.
text.en-trans: kunzang nyi lé mi zhen dé yi chir

text.en: Thus, realizing the equality of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa, I pay homage.
text.en-trans: khordé nyamnyi tokpé chak gyi’o

text.en: Ema!
text.en-trans: ema

text.en: Bodhicitta is and always has been utterly pure—
text.en-trans: döné namdak changchub semnyi dé

text.en: Unburnt by the fires of hell, undiminished among pretas,
text.en-trans: nyal mé ma tsik tré té ma pong shing

text.en: Undimmed among animals, unconstrained by demons.
text.en-trans: düdrö ma tom dü dé matulwé

text.en: To this union of emptiness and compassion, I pray.
text.en-trans: tongnyi nyingjé drel der solwa deb

text.en: Therefrom, you manifested as the illusory yogi
text.en-trans: dé lé chepé gyumé naljorpa

text.en: Of a bygone aeon, Lungten Dorje,
text.en-trans: dé dü kalpar lungten dorjé dang

text.en: And took various forms throughout the three-kāya realms;
text.en-trans: ku sum zhing duma ngé natsok zuk

text.en: You who were the brahmin Pal Rabden during the second age
text.en-trans: nyiden oktu dramzé pal rabden

text.en: And the Tibetan lord, King Tori Nyenshel, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: bö jé nyen shal gyalpor solwa deb

text.en: You who were Murub Tsepo, son of Tri Songdetsen,
text.en-trans: trisong sé gyur mu rub tsepo dang

text.en: Yogi of the Great Compassionate One, Samtenpa,
text.en-trans: tukjé chenpö naljor samten pa

text.en: Mantra-holder of upper Dakpo, Dorje Rabten,
text.en-trans: dak tö ngakchang dorjé rabten zhé

text.en: As well as Buddhadvīpa2—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: buddha diwar ché la solwa deb

text.en: You who were a great hero of the nāgas in Tsarong’s lake,
text.en-trans: tsa rong chu tsor nagé sempa ché

text.en: And the same region’s Pönla Nyingpo Nangdzé,
text.en-trans: yul dé pön la nyingpo nang dzé dang

text.en: Who, in the upper Do Valley, appeared as an exalted one,
text.en-trans: do yul tö du sokyé pakpé tsul

text.en: Kunzang Shenpen—'Ever-Excellent Benefactor'—to you I pray.3
text.en-trans: kunzang zhen la pen der solwa deb

text.en: Although individual forms, beyond expression, may appear tainted
text.en-trans: zhenyang karnak lé kyi tsön na yi

text.en: By the various shades of good and bad actions,
text.en-trans: bakpé rang zuk jöpé tar dé kyang

text.en: Bodhicitta, like mercury, remains unsullied by any flaw.
text.en-trans: changsem ngulchu men dri magöpé

text.en: To this root and branch of benefit and happiness, I pray.
text.en-trans: pendé tsalak dé la solwa deb

text.en: Hereafter, through the play of the three samādhis,
text.en-trans: di ok tingdzin nam sum roltsal lé

text.en: You will appear as an emissary of the three-kāya teacher,
text.en-trans: ku sum tönpé trinlé ponya ba

text.en: A forger of diverse miracles and a master of well-being.
text.en-trans: natsok trul gyi jepo pendé dak

text.en: To this Puntsok Jungné, 'Source of Excellence', I pray.4
text.en-trans: püntsok jungné dé la solwa deb

text.en: Through the force of praying in this way,
text.en-trans: detar solwa tabpé tu nü kyi

text.en: May I never be apart from the noble guru throughout successive rebirths.
text.en-trans: kyewé trengwar lama dampa dang

text.en: May I savour the nine successive vehicles
text.en-trans: dralmé rim gü tekpar longchö né

text.en: And perfect the splendour of the five paths and ten stages.
text.en-trans: sa chu lam ngé palyön tarchin shok
